Others: Dallas Mavericks got an early look at this year’s version of the Clippers during Monday’s preseason game.
Los Angeles Clippers won the game 110-96.
Klay Thompson struggled offensively, going scoreless in the game.
P.J. Washington contributed with 10 points, 3 rebounds, and 3 steals.
Kawhi Leonard did not play due to ongoing recovery from knee surgery.
Veteran forward Derrick Jones Jr. played against his former team for the first time since joining the Clippers.
